import React, { useState } from "react"; import { useLocation } from "react-router-dom"; import { MdOutlineStar } from "react-icons/md"; import { discountCalc } from "../api/List"; import { HiOutlineShoppingBag } from "react-icons/hi"; const ProductPage = () => { const location = useLocation(); const product = location.state; const [itemQty, setItemQty] = useState(1); return (
{product.oldPrice && ( {discountCalc(product.oldPrice, product.price)}% off )}

{product.name}

{product.category.charAt(0).toUpperCase() + product.category.slice(1)}
25 Ratings
₹{product.price} {product.oldPrice && ( <> MRP{" "} ₹{product.oldPrice} ({discountCalc(product.oldPrice, product.price)}% OFF) )}
inclusive of all taxes
Select Size
Quantity
{ setItemQty(itemQty === 1 ? 1 : itemQty - 1); }} className="px-2 select-none border text-sm hover:bg-gray-600 hover:border-gray-600 cursor-pointer hover:text-white duration-200" > - {itemQty} { setItemQty(itemQty + 1); }} className=" px-2 select-none border text-sm hover:bg-gray-600 hover:border-gray-600 cursor-pointer hover:text-white duration-200" > +
); }; export default ProductPage;
